# geometry

**Instance Property**

The geometry associated with this level of detail.

## Declaration

```swift
var geometry: SCNGeometry? { get }
```

## Discussion

SceneKit renders this geometry instead of the original geometry when the level of detail is appropriate. Generally, levels of detail with larger [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLevelOfDetail/worldSpaceDistance] values or smaller [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLevelOfDetail/screenSpaceRadius] values should contain less complex geometries.

If the value of this property is `nil`, SceneKit renders no geometry at this level of detail.

## Inspecting a Level of Detail

- **screenSpaceRadius**: The maximum radius (in pixels) of the geometry’s bounding sphere for this level of detail to appear.
- **worldSpaceDistance**: The minimum distance from the current point of view for this level of detail to appear.
